query.mssql: WITH assigns AS ( SELECT FORMAT(a.Created, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS Created, r.Name AS EmployeeName, CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('(', e.Name) > 0 AND CHARINDEX(')', e.Name) > 0 THEN CONCAT( LEFT(e.Name, CHARINDEX('(', e.Name) - 1), SUBSTRING(e.Name, CHARINDEX(')', e.Name) + 1, LEN(e.Name) - CHARINDEX(')', e.Name)) ) ELSE r.Name END AS Performer, DATEDIFF(day, a.Created, GETDATE()) - (DATEDIFF(WEEK, a.Created, GETDATE()) * 2) - CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, a.Created) = 1 THEN 1 WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, GETDATE()) = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Days, a.[Subject], a.Discriminator, a.Id, r.Department_Company_Sungero as DepId, e.Discriminator as DocDiscriminator FROM Sungero_WF_Assignment a LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient r ON r.Id = a.Performer LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient man ON man.Id = r.Department_Company_Sungero RIGHT JOIN Sungero_WF_Task t ON t.Id = a.Task AND (t.IsIncoming_ExCh_Sungero = 1 OR t.IsIncoming_ExCh_Sungero IS NULL) left JOIN Sungero_WF_Attachment att ON att.Task = t.Id INNER JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc e ON att.AttachmentId = e.Id WHERE a.Status = 'InProcess' and a.Created >= @startDate and a.Created <= @endDate AND a.Discriminator != '0917CA0B-898F-429D-BE37-C12DA50C5A95' ) SELECT assigns.Created, EmployeeName, Performer, mans.Name AS ManagerName, [Days], [Subject], assigns.Discriminator, assigns.Id, assigns.DocDiscriminator FROM assigns LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient deps ON deps.Id = assigns.DepId LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient mans ON mans.Id = deps.Manager_Company_Sungero WHERE Performer NOT LIKE '%Делопроизводитель%';

WITH CTE as ( SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('(', r.Name) > 0 AND CHARINDEX(')', r.Name) > 0 AND r.Name IS NOT NULL THEN RTRIM(REPLACE(r.Name, ' ПП', '')) END as PP FROM Sungero_WF_Assignment a LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient r ON r.Id = a.Performer WHERE a.Status != 'InProcess' and Created >= @startDate and Created <= @endDate ) SELECT PP FROM CTE WHERE PP IS NOT NULL;

WITH assigns AS ( SELECT FORMAT(a.Created, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS Created, CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('(', e.Name) > 0 AND CHARINDEX(')', e.Name) > 0 THEN CONCAT( LEFT(e.Name, CHARINDEX('(', e.Name) - 1), SUBSTRING(e.Name, CHARINDEX(')', e.Name) + 1, LEN(e.Name) - CHARINDEX(')', e.Name)) ) ELSE e.Name END AS Performer, DATEDIFF(day, a.Created, GETDATE()) - (DATEDIFF(WEEK, a.Created, GETDATE()) * 2) - CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, a.Created) = 1 THEN 1 WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, GETDATE()) = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Days, a.Discriminator, e.Department_Company_Sungero AS DepId FROM Sungero_WF_Assignment a LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient e ON e.Id = a.Performer LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient man ON man.Id = e.Department_Company_Sungero right join Sungero_WF_Task t on t.Id = a.MainTask and (t.IsIncoming_ExCh_Sungero = 1 or t.IsIncoming_ExCh_Sungero is null) WHERE a.Status = 'InProcess' and a.Discriminator != '0917CA0B-898F-429D-BE37-C12DA50C5A95' and a.Created >= @startDate and a.Created <= @endDate )
SELECT a.Performer, mans.Name AS Manager, ROUND(AVG(CAST(a.Days AS FLOAT)), 2) AS AvarageDays, COUNT(*) AS NumberTasks FROM assigns a LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient deps ON deps.Id = a.DepId LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient mans ON mans.Id = deps.Manager_Company_Sungero WHERE Performer NOT LIKE '%Делопроизводитель%' GROUP BY a.Performer, mans.Name;
